name: Cheetah
description: The Cheetah is the fastest land animal

name: Koenigsegg Agera RS
description: The Koenigsegg Agera is the fastest production car

name: Freefall
description: Humans typically fall 6 times slower but this is the speed record for human free-fall

name: Sound
description: Sound travels nearly 4 times faster in water than in air

name: Apollo 10
description: Apollo 10 was the fastest human-crewed vehical

name: Juno Spacecraft
description: The Juno probe to Jupiter was the fastest man-made technical object

name: Solar System
description: The solar system orbits at this speed through the Milky Way Galaxy

name: Milky Way
description: The Milky Way Galaxy moves at this speed relative to the rest of the universe

name: Fast Neutron
description: Fast neutrons are produced in nuclear bombs

name: Electron in a Cathode Ray Tube
description: Cathode ray tubes are found in old TVs and computer monitors

name: Lightening
description: While electricity travels at near light speed in a wire, lightening is much slower

name: Fiber Optics
description: Signals in a fiber optic cable offer the fastest earth-bound communication

name: Large Hadron Collider
description: Protons in the large hadron collider are the fastest man-controlled objects

name: Light
description: Light in free space is the fastest thing in the universe
